languages.text: "Ваши подстрекательства были услышаны и не будут забыты. Я налагаю на отсек епитимью за скверные мысли".
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Ваши подстрекательства были услышаны и не будут забыты. Я налагаю на отсек епитимью за скверные мысли".

traits.locale_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for evil thoughts."
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for evil thoughts."
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its evil thoughts."
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its evil thoughts."
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."
"Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

languages.text: "Eure spalterischen Worte wurden gehört und werden nicht vergessen. Ich tadle hiermit diese Abteilung für ihre gottlosen Gedanken."
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Eure spalterischen Worte wurden gehört und werden nicht vergessen. Ich tadle hiermit diese Abteilung für ihre gottlosen Gedanken."

languages.text: «Tus palabras sediciosas se han oído y no se olvidarán. Castigo a este compartimento por sus pensamientos profanos».
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «Tus palabras sediciosas se han oído y no se olvidarán. Castigo a este compartimento por sus pensamientos profanos».

languages.text: 「お前の扇動的な言葉は私の耳に届き、忘れることはない。ここにいる私が、この区画の冒涜的な考えを罰する」
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の扇動的な言葉は私の耳に届き、忘れることはない。ここにいる私が、この区画の冒涜的な考えを罰する」

languages.text: “我已经听到了你们充满煽动意味的话语，我不会忘记这件事情。由于你们的亵渎思想，我要对这个舱室的所有人进行惩处。”
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “我已经听到了你们充满煽动意味的话语，我不会忘记这件事情。由于你们的亵渎思想，我要对这个舱室的所有人进行惩处。”

languages.text: « Vos propos séditieux ont été entendus et nous ne les oublierons pas. Ce compartiment va être châtié pour ses intentions profanes. »
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « Vos propos séditieux ont été entendus et nous ne les oublierons pas. Ce compartiment va être châtié pour ses intentions profanes. »

languages.text: "Kışkırtıcı sözlerin duyuldu ve hafızalara kazındı. Barındırdığı kâfir düşünceler sebebiyle bu kompartımanı cezalandıracağım."
languages.original_text: "Your seditious words have been heard and will not be forgotten. I hereby chastise this compartment for its profane thoughts."
